ComicInfo.Summary:
The splatterific climax! After Vampi's witch trial, she and Ash race to face an abbey swarming with possessed monks. Which is just a speed bump compared to the demonic angels the monks have conjured. A secret chapter from before the siege in Army of Darkness, from Mark Rahner (The Twilight Zone Shadow & Substance) and Jethro Morales (Dejah of Mars).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Tim Seeley (a) & Alex Guimaraes (c) | 1 | B/Sub | Subscription Cover | Tony Fleecs | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Tim Seeley | 3 | D/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Tim Seeley (a) & Alex Guimaraes (c) | 4 | E/LE | Ultra-Limited High-End "Blood Red" Cover, Limited to 50 | Tim Seeley | 5 |
